rule: The output must not classify the input text into one of the four predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: Random string of text unrelated to predefined categories
validityText:
The input specification requires that the input must be a string that represents a news article. Additionally, the content of the news article should generally fit into one of the specific categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. The phrase "Random string of text unrelated to predefined categories" implies that the text is unrelated to World events, Sports, Business, or Science/Technology, which means it is not in compliance with the specification. Therefore, the input violates the condition that it should fit into one of the provided categories.

ERR
